Using stylesheets and javascript in your course¶

The Moodle oppia export block comes by default with a single style that will be applied to any courses you export - so the stylesheet and related resources (images etc) will get exported to the course package too.

Creating your own style¶

To add a new style (or adapt the existing one), create an new css file in the <block>/styles directory, along with a new directory for the resources (see the current folder structure).
